title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When a filter expression like "row[0] equals to 0" is set, the data set returns a wrong result or just a null result set.
OB: When a filter is set in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to 0" and the Preview tab is clicked:
EB: The first record in the result returned when previewing is incorrect.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to 0".
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected Result: The developer mentioned that row[0] can only be generated after fetching all the data. Thus, row[0] should not be used as a filter expression.
